parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Strings

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Structured Text

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Creates a [[Structured Text]] similar to [[format]] command.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[formatText]] [format, argument1, argument2, ...]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> format: [[String]] - a string containing text and/or references to the variables listed below in the array. The references appear in the form of %1, %2 etc.

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> argument: [[Anything]] - use [[Structured Text]] where necessary (see [[#Example|Example 2]])

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Structured Text]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[formatText]] ["Image: %1", [[image]] "\a3\Data_f\Flags\flag_Altis_co.paa"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[formatText]] ["%1%2%3", "line1", "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><br/></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>", "line2"];		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>result displayed in one line</value></part></template>
[[hint]] [[formatText]] ["%1%2%3", "line1", [[lineBreak]], "line2"];	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>result displayed in two lines</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Structured Text]], [[format]], [[composeText]], [[text]], [[parseText]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">

<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
